meanings.definition: A fine spray or light rain of water.
meanings.sent1: The misting from the waterfall felt refreshing on my face.
meanings.sent2: The morning misting made the grass sparkle like diamonds.
meanings.sent3: The misting from the sprinkler turned the backyard into a magical garden.
meanings.sent4: The misting enveloped the forest like a soft, wet blanket.
meanings.sent5: The misting created a dreamy atmosphere in the garden.

meanings.definition: To spray with a fine mist.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys misting her plants to keep them hydrated.
meanings.sent2: The gardener was misting the delicate flowers with care.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly misted his friend with water during the hot day.
meanings.sent4: The chef expertly misted the salad with a light vinaigrette.
meanings.sent5: Misting the room with lavender spray helped her relax.

meanings.definition: The act of producing a mist.
meanings.sent1: The misting of the humidifier improved the air quality in the room.
meanings.sent2: The misting of the fountain created a serene atmosphere in the park.
meanings.sent3: The misting of the fog machine added a mysterious touch to the play.
meanings.sent4: The misting of the ocean waves created a magical scene at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The misting of the waterfall was a sight to behold in the forest.
